title: Why am I getting banned for two weeks?
body: When I play league, I try my best to be a decent human being. So, I talk sht to NObody and do my best to survive the toxicity each game. However I'm actually getting banned for nothing. Riot please fix this...

replies.body: I had to double-check, but it doesn't look like this account is banned or suspended at all. If this is about a different account, you can reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see about recovering your other one.
